rows.label: qst200221_msg0001
rows.name:
So, we meet at last.
You must be Harghal!

rows.label: qst200221_msg0002
rows.name:
And you are?
New couriers or something?

rows.label: qst200221_msg0003
rows.name:
We are no such thing!
I am an ally of justice, come to
set you on the path of righteousness!

rows.label: qst200221_msg0004
rows.name: Uhhh... What are you on about?

rows.label: qst200221_msg0005
rows.name:
We have heard all about you, Harghal!
Tell me, why would you stoop to
smuggling Pollen Orbs?!

rows.label: qst200221_msg0007
rows.name:
What's wrong?
Why the sudden silence?

rows.label: qst200221_msg0009
rows.name:
Why do you avert your eyes?
Is there something you are still hiding?

rows.label: qst200221_msg0012
rows.name:
Hmm... It would appear this girl is
using the Pollen Orbs as ingredients
to create something else.

rows.label: qst200221_msg0013
rows.name:
What's going on here, Harghal?!
Are you not smuggling Pollen Orbs
after all?!

rows.label: qst200221_msg0014
rows.name: Tell us what you are hiding!

rows.label: qst200221_msg0017
rows.name: Very well! I'll pull out all the stops!
